plot: A man gets a strange visit from a young dancer. In the space of a short presentation, she dances a tango. He does not know whether it's a dream or reality.
title: El pañuelo azul
plot_es: A man gets a strange visit from a young dancer. In the space of a short presentation, she dances a tango. He does not know whether it's a dream or reality.
plot_en: A man gets a strange visit from a young dancer. In the space of a short presentation, she dances a tango. He does not know whether it's a dream or reality.
